QuestData.Title: On Ruby Wings
QuestData.Description: Use this beacon to signal a Wyrmrest vanquisher. Climb upon its back and fly north to Galakrond's Rest. Once there, command the dragon to destroy the Scourge scavengers that work to unearth Galakrond. Once the area has been cleansed, fly to the Wicked Coil, overlooking Galakrond's Rest, to destroy Grand Necrolord Antiok and recover the scythe that he uses to control the wyrms.$B$BDo this and return to Queen Alexstrasza for a hero's reward!$B$B$n, beware the rotting storm giants that wander the area!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 30 Wastes Scavengers and recover the Scythe of Antiok. Return to Alexstrasza the Life-Binder at Wyrmrest Temple should you complete this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: Destroy the Scourge at Galakrond's Rest before it is too late!
QuestData.RewardText: I knew that you would return, $n. You have served the Wyrmrest Accord and saved your people from certain death. Let it be known to all and let it be recorded for posterity!
